description: Turn up the flavour with this slow-cooked chicken miso soup recipe. Miso, soy and mirin add depth, while chicken and veggies provide old-fashioned goodness.
name: Slow Cooker Chicken Miso Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 750 g Woolworths skinless chicken thigh cutlets

recipeInstructions.text: Return chicken to slow cooker and add soy, mirin and broccolini. Cover with lid and cook for 3 minutes or until broccolini is just tender. Ladle soup into bowls. Serve topped with coriander and shallots.
